title.raw: 《孟嘗君列傳》 Biography of Lord Mengchang

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君名文，姓田氏。

translations.literal: Lord Mengchang's name was Wen, and his surname was Tian.

sentences.zh: 文之父曰靖郭君田嬰。

translations.literal: Wen's father was called Lord Jingguo, Tian Ying.

sentences.zh: 田嬰者，齊威王少子而齊宣王庶弟也。

translations.literal: Tian Ying, Qi Wei King young son and Qi Xuan King concubine brother.

sentences.zh: 田嬰自威王時任職用事，與成侯鄒忌及田忌將而救韓伐魏。

translations.literal: Tian Ying from Wei King time hold office handle affairs, with Cheng Hou Zou Ji and Tian Ji general save Han attack Wei.

sentences.zh: 成侯與田忌爭寵，成侯賣田忌。

translations.literal: Cheng Hou with Tian Ji contend favor, Cheng Hou sell out Tian Ji.

sentences.zh: 田忌懼，襲齊之邊邑，不勝，亡走。

translations.literal: Tian Ji fear, attack Qi border city, not win, flee go.

sentences.zh: 會威王卒，宣王立，知成侯賣田忌，乃復召田忌以為將。

translations.literal: Meet Wei King die, Xuan King stand, know Cheng Hou sell out Tian Ji, then again summon Tian Ji as general.

sentences.zh: 宣王二年，田忌與孫臏、田嬰俱伐魏，敗之馬陵，虜魏太子申而殺魏將龐涓。

translations.literal: Xuan King two years, Tian Ji with Sun Bin, Tian Ying together attack Wei, defeat at Ma Ling, capture Wei crown prince Shen kill Wei general Pang Juan.

sentences.zh: 宣王七年，田嬰使於韓、魏，韓、魏服於齊。

translations.literal: Xuan King seven years, Tian Ying envoy to Han Wei, Han Wei submit to Qi.

sentences.zh: 嬰與韓昭侯、魏惠王會齊宣王東阿南，盟而去。

translations.literal: Ying with Han Zhao Hou, Wei Hui King meet Qi Xuan King Dong E south, alliance depart.

sentences.zh: 明年，復與梁惠王會甄。

translations.literal: Next year, again with Liang Hui King meet Zhen.

sentences.zh: 是歲，梁惠王卒。

translations.literal: This year, Liang Hui King die.

sentences.zh: 宣王九年，田嬰相齊。

translations.literal: Xuan King nine years, Tian Ying chancellor Qi.

sentences.zh: 齊宣王與魏襄王會徐州而相王也。

translations.literal: Qi Xuan King with Wei Xiang King meet Xu Zhou mutually wang.

sentences.zh: 楚威王聞之，怒田嬰。

translations.literal: Chu Wei King hear, angry Tian Ying.

sentences.zh: 明年，楚伐敗齊師於徐州，而使人逐田嬰。

translations.literal: Next year, Chu attack defeat Qi forces at Xu Zhou, make person pursue Tian Ying.

sentences.zh: 田嬰使張丑說楚威王，威王乃止。

translations.literal: Tian Ying make Zhang Chou advise Chu Wei King, Wei King then stop.

sentences.zh: 田嬰相齊十一年，宣王卒，湣王即位。

translations.literal: Tian Ying chancellor Qi eleven years, Xuan King die, Min King ascend throne.

sentences.zh: 即位三年，而封田嬰於薛。

translations.literal: Ascend throne three years, enfeoff Tian Ying at Xue.

Meng Chang Jun name Wen, surname Tian. Wen father call Jing Guo Jun Tian Ying. Tian Ying, Qi Wei Wang young son and Qi Xuan Wang concubine brother. Tian Ying from Wei Wang time hold office handle affairs, with Cheng Hou Zou Ji and Tian Ji general save Han attack Wei. Cheng Hou with Tian Ji contend favor, Cheng Hou sell out Tian Ji. Tian Ji fear, attack Qi border city, not win, flee go. Meet Wei Wang die, Xuan Wang stand, know Cheng Hou sell out Tian Ji, then again summon Tian Ji as general. Xuan Wang two years, Tian Ji with Sun Bin, Tian Ying together attack Wei, defeat at Ma Ling, capture Wei crown prince Shen kill Wei general Pang Juan. Xuan Wang seven years, Tian Ying envoy to Han Wei, Han Wei submit to Qi. Ying with Han Zhao Hou, Wei Hui Wang meet Qi Xuan Wang Dong E south, alliance depart. Next year, again with Liang Hui Wang meet Zhen. This year, Liang Hui Wang die. Xuan Wang nine years, Tian Ying chancellor Qi. Qi Xuan Wang with Wei Xiang Wang meet Xu Zhou mutually wang. Chu Wei Wang hear, angry Tian Ying. Next year, Chu attack defeat Qi army at Xu Zhou, make person pursue Tian Ying. Tian Ying make Zhang Chou advise Chu Wei Wang, Wei Wang then stop. Tian Ying chancellor Qi eleven years, Xuan Wang die, Min Wang ascend throne. Ascend throne three years, enfeoff Tian Ying at Xue.

sentences.zh: 初，田嬰有子四十餘人。

translations.literal: Originally, Tian Ying have son forty more people.

sentences.zh: 其賤妾有子名文，文以五月五日生。

translations.literal: His lowly concubine have son name Wen, Wen with five month five day born.

sentences.zh: 嬰告其母曰：「勿舉也。」

translations.literal: Ying tell his mother: Do not raise.

sentences.zh: 其母竊舉生之。

translations.literal: His mother secretly raise give birth.

sentences.zh: 及長，其母因兄弟而見其子文於田嬰。

translations.literal: Reach grow, his mother because brothers see their son Wen to Tian Ying.

sentences.zh: 田嬰怒其母曰：「吾令若去此子，而敢生之，何也？」

translations.literal: Tian Ying angry his mother: My command you abandon this child, dare give birth, why?

sentences.zh: 文頓首，因曰：「君所以不舉五月子者，何故？」

translations.literal: Wen kowtow, because say: Jun so not raise five month child, what reason?

sentences.zh: 嬰曰：「五月子者，長與戶齊，將不利其父母。」

translations.literal: Ying say: Five month child, grow with door even, will harm parents.

sentences.zh: 文曰：「人生受命於天乎？

translations.literal: Wen say: Person life receive mandate from heaven?

sentences.zh: 將受命於戶邪？」

translations.literal: Will receive mandate from door?

sentences.zh: 嬰默然。

translations.literal: Ying silent.

sentences.zh: 文曰：「必受命於天，君何憂焉。

translations.literal: Wen say: Must receive mandate from heaven, jun what worry.
translations.idiomatic: Wen say: Must receive mandate from heaven, ruler what worry.

sentences.zh: 必受命於戶，則可高其戶耳，誰能至者！」

translations.literal: Must receive mandate from door, then can high its door, who can reach!

sentences.zh: 嬰曰：「子休矣。」

translations.literal: Ying say: Son rest.

Originally, Tian Ying have son forty more people. His lowly concubine have son name Wen, Wen with five month five day born. Ying tell his mother: Do not raise. His mother secretly raise give birth. Reach grow, his mother because brothers see their son Wen to Tian Ying. Tian Ying angry his mother: My command you abandon this child, dare give birth, why? Wen kowtow, because say: Jun so not raise five month child, what reason? Ying say: Five month child, grow with door even, will harm parents. Wen say: Person life receive mandate from heaven? Will receive mandate from door? Ying silent. Wen say: Must receive mandate from heaven, jun what worry. Must receive mandate from door, then can high its door, who can reach! Ying say: Son rest.

sentences.zh: 久之，文承閒問其父嬰曰：「子之子為何？」

translations.literal: Long time, Wen take opportunity ask his father Ying: Son son what?

sentences.zh: 曰：「為孫。」

translations.literal: Say: For grandson.

sentences.zh: 「孫之孫為何？」

translations.literal: Grandson grandson what?

sentences.zh: 曰：「為玄孫。」

translations.literal: Say: For great grandson.

sentences.zh: 「玄孫之孫為何？」

translations.literal: Great grandson grandson what?

sentences.zh: 曰：「不能知也。」

translations.literal: Say: Cannot know.

sentences.zh: 文曰：「君用事相齊，至今三王矣，齊不加廣而君私家富累萬金，門下不見一賢者。

translations.literal: Wen say: Jun handle affairs chancellor Qi, to now three kings, Qi not add broad yet jun private family rich accumulate ten thousand gold, gate below not see one worthy.
translations.idiomatic: Wen say: Jun handle affairs chancellor Qi, to now three kings, Qi not add broad yet ruler private family rich accumulate ten thousand gold, gate below not see one worthy.

sentences.zh: 文聞將門必有將，相門必有相。

translations.literal: Wen hear will gate must have general, chancellor gate must have chancellor.

sentences.zh: 今君後宮蹈綺縠而士不得（短）［裋］褐，仆妾餘粱肉而士不厭糟糠。

translations.literal: Now ruler rear palace step silk satin yet scholar not obtain coarse cloth, servant concubine remain fine grain meat yet scholar not satiated bran chaff.

sentences.zh: 今君又尚厚積餘藏，欲以遺所不知何人，而忘公家之事日損，文竊怪之。」

translations.literal: Now ruler moreover still thick accumulate surplus store, wish leave to not know what person, forget public family affairs day damage, Wen secretly strange it.

sentences.zh: 於是嬰乃禮文，使主家待賓客。

translations.literal: Then Ying then courtesy Wen, make manage family receive guests.

sentences.zh: 賓客日進，名聲聞於諸侯。

translations.literal: Guests day advance, name sound heard at feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 諸侯皆使人請薛公田嬰以文為太子，嬰許之。

translations.literal: Feudal lords all make person request Xue Gong Tian Ying with Wen as crown prince, Ying permit.

sentences.zh: 嬰卒，謚為靖郭君。

translations.literal: Ying die, posthumous name Jing Guo Jun.

sentences.zh: 而文果代立於薛，是為孟嘗君。

translations.literal: Wen indeed succeed stand at Xue, is Meng Chang Jun.

Long time, Wen take opportunity ask his father Ying: Son son what? Say: For grandson. Grandson grandson what? Say: For great grandson. Great grandson grandson what? Say: Cannot know. Wen say: Jun handle affairs chancellor Qi, to now three kings, Qi not add broad yet jun private family rich accumulate ten thousand gold, gate below not see one worthy. Wen hear will gate must have general, chancellor gate must have chancellor. Now jun rear palace step silk satin yet scholar not obtain coarse cloth, servant concubine remain fine grain meat yet scholar not satiated bran chaff. Now jun moreover still thick accumulate surplus store, wish leave to not know what person, forget public family affairs day damage, Wen secretly strange it. Then Ying then courtesy Wen, make manage family receive guests. Guests day advance, name sound heard at feudal lords. Feudal lords all make person request Xue Gong Tian Ying with Wen as crown prince, Ying permit. Ying die, posthumous name Jing Guo Jun. Wen indeed succeed stand at Xue, is Meng Chang Jun.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君在薛，招致諸侯賓客及亡人有罪者，皆歸孟嘗君。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun at Xue, recruit attract feudal lords guests and flee have crime people, all belong Meng Chang Jun.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君舍業厚遇之，以故傾天下之士。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun house industry thick treat them, with reason incline world scholars.

sentences.zh: 食客數千人，無貴賤一與文等。

translations.literal: Eat guests several thousand people, no noble lowly one with Wen equal.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君待客坐語，而屏風後常有侍史，主記君所與客語，問親戚居處。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun receive guests sit speak, screen behind often have serve historian, main record ruler with guest speak, ask relatives dwell place.

sentences.zh: 客去，孟嘗君已使使存問，獻遺其親戚。

translations.literal: Guest go, Meng Chang Jun already make messenger visit ask, offer send their relatives.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君曾待客夜食，有一人蔽火光。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun once receive guest night eat, have one person block fire light.

sentences.zh: 客怒，以飯不等，輟食辭去。

translations.literal: Guest angry, with rice not equal, stop eat leave go.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君起，自持其飯比之。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun rise, self hold his rice compare.

sentences.zh: 客慚，自剄。

translations.literal: Guest ashamed, self stab.

sentences.zh: 士以此多歸孟嘗君。

translations.literal: Scholars with this many belong Meng Chang Jun.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君客無所擇，皆善遇之。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun guest no choose, all good treat them.

sentences.zh: 人人各自以為孟嘗君親己。

translations.literal: People people self consider Meng Chang Jun close self.

Meng Chang Jun at Xue, recruit attract feudal lords guests and flee have crime people, all belong Meng Chang Jun. Meng Chang Jun house industry thick treat them, with reason incline world scholars. Eat guests several thousand people, no noble lowly one with Wen equal. Meng Chang Jun receive guests sit speak, screen behind often have serve historian, main record jun with guest speak, ask relatives dwell place. Guest go, Meng Chang Jun already make messenger visit ask, offer send their relatives. Meng Chang Jun once receive guest night eat, have one person block fire light. Guest angry, with rice not equal, stop eat leave go. Meng Chang Jun rise, self hold his rice compare. Guest ashamed, self stab. Scholars with this many belong Meng Chang Jun. Meng Chang Jun guest no choose, all good treat them. People people self consider Meng Chang Jun close self.

sentences.zh: 秦昭王聞其賢，乃先使涇陽君為質於齊，以求見孟嘗君。

translations.literal: Qin Zhao King hear his worthy, then first make Jing Yang Jun as hostage at Qi, to seek see Meng Chang Jun.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君將入秦，賓客莫欲其行，諫，不聽。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun will enter Qin, guests not wish his go, advise, not listen.

sentences.zh: 蘇代謂曰：「今旦代從外來，見木禺人與土禺人相與語。

translations.literal: Su Dai say: Now morning Dai from outside come, see wood puppet person with earth puppet person mutually speak.

sentences.zh: 木禺人曰：『天雨，子將敗矣。』

translations.literal: Wood puppet person say: Heaven rain, you will ruin.

sentences.zh: 土禺人曰：『我生於土，敗則歸土。

translations.literal: Earth puppet person say: I born from earth, ruin then return earth.

sentences.zh: 今天雨，流子而行，未知所止息也。』

translations.literal: Now heaven rain, flow you go, unknown where stop rest.

sentences.zh: 今秦，虎狼之國也，而君欲往，如有不得還，君得無為土禺人所笑乎？」

translations.literal: Now Qin, tiger wolf country, jun wish go, if have not obtain return, jun obtain no for earth puppet person laughed?
translations.idiomatic: Now Qin, tiger wolf country, ruler wish go, if have not obtain return, ruler obtain no for earth puppet person laughed?

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君乃止。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun then stop.

Qin Zhao Wang hear his worthy, then first make Jing Yang Jun as hostage at Qi, to seek see Meng Chang Jun. Meng Chang Jun will enter Qin, guests not wish his go, advise, not listen. Su Dai say: Now morning Dai from outside come, see wood puppet person with earth puppet person mutually speak. Wood puppet person say: Heaven rain, you will ruin. Earth puppet person say: I born from earth, ruin then return earth. Now heaven rain, flow you go, unknown where stop rest. Now Qin, tiger wolf country, jun wish go, if have not obtain return, jun obtain no for earth puppet person laughed? Meng Chang Jun then stop.

sentences.zh: 齊湣王二十五年，復卒使孟嘗君入秦，昭王即以孟嘗君為秦相。

translations.literal: Qi Min King twenty five years, again finally make Meng Chang Jun enter Qin, Zhao King then with Meng Chang Jun as Qin chancellor.

sentences.zh: 人或說秦昭王曰：「孟嘗君賢，而又齊族也，今相秦，必先齊而後秦，秦其危矣。」

translations.literal: Person or advise Qin Zhao Wang: Meng Chang Jun worthy, moreover Qi clan, now chancellor Qin, certainly first Qi after Qin, Qin its danger.
translations.idiomatic: Person or advise Qin Zhao King: Meng Chang Jun worthy, moreover Qi clan, now chancellor Qin, certainly first Qi after Qin, Qin its danger.

sentences.zh: 於是秦昭王乃止。

translations.literal: Then Qin Zhao King then stop.

sentences.zh: 囚孟嘗君，謀欲殺之。

translations.literal: Imprison Meng Chang Jun, plan wish kill him.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君使人抵昭王幸姬求解。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun make person bribe Zhao King favored concubine seek release.

sentences.zh: 幸姬曰：「妾願得君狐白裘。」

translations.literal: Favored concubine say: Concubine wish obtain jun fox white fur coat.
translations.idiomatic: Favored concubine say: Concubine wish obtain ruler fox white fur coat.

sentences.zh: 此時孟嘗君有一狐白裘，直千金，天下無雙，入秦獻之昭王，更無他裘。

translations.literal: This time Meng Chang Jun have one fox white fur coat, worth thousand gold, world no double, enter Qin offer Zhao King, more no other fur coat.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君患之，遍問客，莫能對。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun troubled, extensively ask guests, none can answer.

sentences.zh: 最下坐有能為狗盜者，曰：「臣能得狐白裘。」

translations.literal: Most low sit have can be dog thief, say: Minister can obtain fox white fur coat.

sentences.zh: 乃夜為狗，以入秦宮臧中，取所獻狐白裘至，以獻秦王幸姬。

translations.literal: Then night be dog, enter Qin palace storehouse, take offered fox white fur coat come, offer Qin King favored concubine.

sentences.zh: 幸姬為言昭王，昭王釋孟嘗君。

translations.literal: Favored concubine for speak Zhao King, Zhao King release Meng Chang Jun.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君得出，即馳去，更封傳，變名姓以出關。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun obtain emerge, then gallop go, change seal pass, change name surname emerge pass.

sentences.zh: 夜半至函谷關。

translations.literal: Night half arrive Han Gu Pass.

sentences.zh: 秦昭王後悔出孟嘗君，求之已去，即使人馳傳逐之。

translations.literal: Qin Zhao King after regret release Meng Chang Jun, seek already go, then make person gallop pass pursue.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君至關，關法雞鳴而出客，孟嘗君恐追至，客之居下坐者有能為雞鳴，而雞齊鳴，遂發傳出。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun arrive pass, pass law chicken crow emerge guest, Meng Chang Jun fear pursue arrive, guest dwell low sit have can be chicken crow, chicken together crow, then issue pass emerge.

sentences.zh: 出如食頃，秦追果至關，已後孟嘗君出，乃還。

translations.literal: Emerge like eat time, Qin pursue indeed arrive pass, already after Meng Chang Jun emerge, then return.

sentences.zh: 始孟嘗君列此二人於賓客，賓客盡羞之，及孟嘗君有秦難，卒此二人拔之。

translations.literal: Begin Meng Chang Jun list this two people at guests, guests all ashamed, reach Meng Chang Jun have Qin difficulty, finally this two people pull him.

sentences.zh: 自是之後，客皆服。

translations.literal: From this after, guests all submit.

Qi Min Wang twenty five years, again finally make Meng Chang Jun enter Qin, Zhao Wang then with Meng Chang Jun as Qin chancellor. Person or advise Qin Zhao Wang: Meng Chang Jun worthy, moreover Qi clan, now chancellor Qin, certainly first Qi after Qin, Qin its danger. Then Qin Zhao Wang then stop. Imprison Meng Chang Jun, plan wish kill him. Meng Chang Jun make person bribe Zhao Wang favored concubine seek release. Favored concubine say: Concubine wish obtain jun fox white fur coat. This time Meng Chang Jun have one fox white fur coat, worth thousand gold, world no double, enter Qin offer Zhao Wang, more no other fur coat. Meng Chang Jun troubled, extensively ask guests, none can answer. Most low sit have can be dog thief, say: Minister can obtain fox white fur coat. Then night be dog, enter Qin palace storehouse, take offered fox white fur coat come, offer Qin Wang favored concubine. Favored concubine for speak Zhao Wang, Zhao Wang release Meng Chang Jun. Meng Chang Jun obtain emerge, then gallop go, change seal pass, change name surname emerge pass. Night half arrive Han Gu Pass. Qin Zhao Wang after regret release Meng Chang Jun, seek already go, then make person gallop pass pursue. Meng Chang Jun arrive pass, pass law chicken crow emerge guest, Meng Chang Jun fear pursue arrive, guest dwell low sit have can be chicken crow, chicken together crow, then issue pass emerge. Emerge like eat time, Qin pursue indeed arrive pass, already after Meng Chang Jun emerge, then return. Begin Meng Chang Jun list this two people at guests, guests all ashamed, reach Meng Chang Jun have Qin difficulty, finally this two people pull him. From this after, guests all submit.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君過趙，趙平原君客之。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun pass Zhao, Zhao Ping Yuan Jun guest him.

sentences.zh: 趙人聞孟嘗君賢，出觀之，皆笑曰：「始以薛公為魁然也，今視之，乃眇小丈夫耳。」

translations.literal: Zhao people hear Meng Chang Jun worthy, emerge view him, all laugh: Begin with Xue Gong as outstanding, now see him, is small short man.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君聞之，怒。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun hear, angry.

sentences.zh: 客與俱者下，斫擊殺數百人，遂滅一縣以去。

translations.literal: Guests with together below, chop attack kill several hundred people, then extinguish one county go.

Meng Chang Jun pass Zhao, Zhao Ping Yuan Jun guest him. Zhao people hear Meng Chang Jun worthy, emerge view him, all laugh: Begin with Xue Gong as outstanding, now see him, is small short man. Meng Chang Jun hear, angry. Guests with together below, chop attack kill several hundred people, then extinguish one county go.

sentences.zh: 齊湣王不自得，以其遣孟嘗君。

translations.literal: Qi Min King not self obtain, with his send Meng Chang Jun.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君至，則以為齊相，任政。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun arrive, then with as Qi chancellor, hold government.
Qi Min Wang not self obtain, with his send Meng Chang Jun. Meng Chang Jun arrive, then with as Qi chancellor, hold government.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君怨秦，將以齊為韓、魏攻楚，因與韓、魏攻秦，而借兵食於西周。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun resent Qin, will with Qi for Han Wei attack Chu, because with Han Wei attack Qin, borrow soldiers food at west Zhou.

sentences.zh: 蘇代為西周謂曰：「君以齊為韓、魏攻楚九年，取宛、葉以北以彊韓、魏，今復攻秦以益之。

translations.literal: Su Dai for west Zhou advise: Jun with Qi for Han Wei attack Chu nine years, take Wan Ye north strengthen Han Wei, now again attack Qin increase them.

sentences.zh: 韓、魏南無楚憂，西無秦患，則齊危矣。

translations.literal: Han Wei south no Chu worry, west no Qin suffer, then Qi danger.

sentences.zh: 韓、魏必輕齊畏秦，臣為君危之。

translations.literal: Han Wei certainly light Qi fear Qin, minister for ruler danger it.

sentences.zh: 君不如令敝邑深合於秦，而君無攻，又無借兵食。

translations.literal: Jun not as make poor city deep unite Qin, ruler no attack, moreover no borrow soldiers food.

sentences.zh: 君臨函谷而無攻，令敝邑以君之情謂秦昭王曰『薛公必不破秦以彊韓、魏。

translations.literal: Jun face Han Gu no attack, make poor city with ruler emotion tell Qin Zhao King say Xue Gong certainly not break Qin strengthen Han Wei.

sentences.zh: 其攻秦也，欲王之令楚王割東國以與齊，而秦出楚懷王以為和』。

translations.literal: His attack Qin, wish wang make Chu King divide east country give Qi, Qin emerge Chu Huai King for peace.

sentences.zh: 君令敝邑以此惠秦，秦得無破而以東國自免也，秦必欲之。

translations.literal: Jun make poor city with this favor Qin, Qin obtain no break give east country self avoid, Qin certainly wish.

sentences.zh: 楚王得出，必德齊。

translations.literal: Chu King obtain emerge, certainly virtue Qi.

sentences.zh: 齊得東國益彊，而薛世世無患矣。

translations.literal: Qi obtain east country more strong, Xue generation generation no worry.

sentences.zh: 秦不大弱，而處三晉之西，三晉必重齊。」

translations.literal: Qin not great weak, dwell three Jin west, three Jin certainly heavy Qi.

sentences.zh: 薛公曰：「善。」

translations.literal: Xue Gong say: Good.

sentences.zh: 因令韓、魏賀秦，使三國無攻，而不借兵食於西周矣。

translations.literal: Because make Han Wei congratulate Qin, make three countries no attack, not borrow soldiers food at west Zhou.

sentences.zh: 是時，楚懷王入秦，秦留之，故欲必出之。

translations.literal: This time, Chu Huai King enter Qin, Qin detain him, therefore wish certainly emerge him.

sentences.zh: 秦不果出楚懷王。

translations.literal: Qin not indeed emerge Chu Huai King.

Han Wei south no Chu worry, west no Qin suffer, then Qi danger. Han Wei certainly light Qi fear Qin, minister for jun danger it. Jun not as make poor city deep unite Qin, jun no attack, moreover no borrow troops food. Jun face Han Gu no attack, make poor city with jun emotion tell Qin Zhao Wang say Xue Gong certainly not break Qin strengthen Han Wei. His attack Qin, wish wang make Chu Wang divide east country give Qi, Qin emerge Chu Huai Wang for peace. Because make Han Wei congratulate Qin, make three countries no attack, not borrow troops food at west Zhou. This time, Chu Huai Wang enter Qin, Qin detain him, therefore wish certainly emerge him. Qin not indeed emerge Chu Huai Wang.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君相齊，其舍人魏子為孟嘗君收邑入，三反而不致一入。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun chancellor Qi, his house person Wei Zi for Meng Chang Jun collect city income, three return not bring one income.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君問之，對曰：「有賢者，竊假與之，以故不致入。」

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun ask him, answer: Have worthy person, secretly lend with him, with reason not bring income.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君怒而退魏子。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun angry retire Wei Zi.

sentences.zh: 居數年，人或毀孟嘗君於齊湣王曰：「孟嘗君將為亂。」

translations.literal: Dwell several years, person or slander Meng Chang Jun at Qi Min Wang: Meng Chang Jun will chaos.
translations.idiomatic: Dwell several years, person or slander Meng Chang Jun at Qi Min King: Meng Chang Jun will chaos.

sentences.zh: 及田甲劫湣王，湣王意疑孟嘗君，孟嘗君乃奔。

translations.literal: Reach Tian Jia kidnap Min King, Min King intention suspect Meng Chang Jun, Meng Chang Jun then flee.

sentences.zh: 魏子所與粟賢者聞之，乃上書言孟嘗君不作亂，請以身為盟，遂自剄宮門以明孟嘗君。

translations.literal: Wei Zi given grain worthy person hear, then present book speak Meng Chang Jun not make chaos, please with body as pledge, then self stab palace gate to bright Meng Chang Jun.

sentences.zh: 湣王乃驚，而蹤跡驗問，孟嘗君果無反謀，乃復召孟嘗君。

translations.literal: Min King then shocked, track verify ask, Meng Chang Jun indeed no rebel plan, then again summon Meng Chang Jun.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君因謝病，歸老於薛。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun because thank illness, return old at Xue.

sentences.zh: 湣王許之。

translations.literal: Min King permit.

Meng Chang Jun chancellor Qi, his house person Wei Zi for Meng Chang Jun collect city income, three return not bring one income. Meng Chang Jun ask him, answer: Have worthy person, secretly lend with him, with reason not bring income. Meng Chang Jun angry retire Wei Zi. Min Wang then shocked, track verify ask, Meng Chang Jun indeed no rebel plan, then again summon Meng Chang Jun. Meng Chang Jun because thank illness, return old at Xue. Min Wang permit.

sentences.zh: 其後，秦亡將呂禮相齊，欲困蘇代。

translations.literal: After, Qin perished general Lu Li chancellor Qi, wish distress Su Dai.

sentences.zh: 代乃謂孟嘗君曰：「周最於齊，至厚也，而齊王逐之，而聽親弗相呂禮者，欲取秦也。

translations.literal: Dai then tell Meng Chang Jun: Zhou most at Qi, to thick, yet Qi Wang pursue him, listen close Fu not chancellor Lu Li, wish take Qin.
translations.idiomatic: Dai then tell Meng Chang Jun: Zhou most at Qi, to thick, yet Qi King pursue him, listen close Fu not chancellor Lu Li, wish take Qin.

sentences.zh: 齊、秦合，則親弗與呂禮重矣。

translations.literal: Qi Qin unite, then close Fu with Lu Li heavy.

sentences.zh: 有用，齊、秦必輕君。

translations.literal: Have use, Qi Qin certainly light ruler.

sentences.zh: 君不如急北兵，趨趙以和秦、魏，收周最以厚行，且反齊王之信，又禁天下之變。

translations.literal: Jun not as urgent north soldiers, hasten Zhao peace Qin Wei, collect Zhou most thick conduct, moreover return Qi King trust, again prohibit world change.

sentences.zh: 齊無秦，則天下集齊，親弗必走，則齊王孰與為其國也！」

translations.literal: Qi no Qin, then world gather Qi, close Fu certainly flee, then Qi Wang who with make his country!
translations.idiomatic: Qi no Qin, then world gather Qi, close Fu certainly flee, then Qi King who with make his country!

sentences.zh: 於是孟嘗君從其計，而呂禮嫉害於孟嘗君。

translations.literal: Then Meng Chang Jun from his plan, Lu Li envy harm Meng Chang Jun.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君懼，乃遺秦相穰侯魏冉書曰：「吾聞秦欲以呂禮收齊，齊，天下之彊國也，子必輕矣。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun fear, then send Qin chancellor Rang Hou Wei Ran book: I hear Qin wish with Lu Li collect Qi, Qi world strong country, you certainly light.

sentences.zh: 齊秦相取以臨三晉，呂禮必并相矣，是子通齊以重呂禮也。

translations.literal: Qi Qin mutually take face three Jin, Lu Li certainly together chancellor, is you through Qi heavy Lu Li.

sentences.zh: 若齊免於天下之兵，其讎子必深矣。

translations.literal: If Qi avoid world soldiers, its enemy you certainly deep.

sentences.zh: 子不如勸秦王伐齊。

translations.literal: You not as advise Qin King attack Qi.

sentences.zh: 齊破，吾請以所得封子。

translations.literal: Qi break, I please with obtained enfeoff you.

sentences.zh: 齊破，秦畏晉之彊，秦必重子以取晉。

translations.literal: Qi break, Qin fear Jin strong, Qin certainly heavy you take Jin.

sentences.zh: 晉國敝於齊而畏秦，晉必重子以取秦。

translations.literal: Jin country tired at Qi fear Qin, Jin certainly heavy you take Qin.

sentences.zh: 是子破齊以為功，挾晉以為重；

translations.literal: Is you break Qi make merit, hold Jin make heavy;

sentences.zh: 是子破齊定封，秦、晉交重子。

translations.literal: Is you break Qi fix enfeoff, Qin Jin mutually heavy you.

sentences.zh: 若齊不破，呂禮復用，子必大窮。」

translations.literal: If Qi not break, Lu Li again use, you certainly great poor.

sentences.zh: 於是穰侯言於秦昭王伐齊，而呂禮亡。

sentences.zh: 後齊湣王滅宋，益驕，欲去孟嘗君。

translations.literal: After Qi Min King extinguish Song, more arrogant, wish depart Meng Chang Jun.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君恐，乃如魏。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun fear, then go Wei.

sentences.zh: 魏昭王以為相，西合於秦、趙，與燕共伐破齊。

translations.literal: Wei Zhao King with as chancellor, west unite Qin Zhao, with Yan together attack break Qi.

sentences.zh: 齊湣王亡在莒，遂死焉。

translations.literal: Qi Min King perish at Ju, then die.

sentences.zh: 齊襄王立，而孟嘗君中立於諸侯，無所屬。

translations.literal: Qi Xiang King stand, Meng Chang Jun middle stand at feudal lords, no belong.

sentences.zh: 齊襄王新立，畏孟嘗君，與連和，復親薛公。

translations.literal: Qi Xiang King new stand, fear Meng Chang Jun, with connect peace, again close Xue Gong.

sentences.zh: 文卒，謚為孟嘗君。

translations.literal: Wen die, posthumous name Meng Chang Jun.

sentences.zh: 諸子爭立，而齊魏共滅薛。

translations.literal: Various sons contend stand, Qi Wei together extinguish Xue.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗絕嗣無後也。

translations.literal: Meng Chang cut posterity no after.

After Qi Min Wang extinguish Song, more arrogant, wish depart Meng Chang Jun. Meng Chang Jun fear, then go Wei. Wei Zhao Wang with as chancellor, west unite Qin Zhao, with Yan together attack break Qi. Qi Min Wang perish at Ju, then die. Qi Xiang Wang stand, Meng Chang Jun middle stand at feudal lords, no belong. Qi Xiang Wang new stand, fear Meng Chang Jun, with connect peace, again close Xue Gong. Wen die, posthumous name Meng Chang Jun. Various sons contend stand, Qi Wei together extinguish Xue. Meng Chang cut posterity no after.

sentences.zh: 初，馮驩聞孟嘗君好客，躡蹻而見之。

translations.literal: Originally, Feng Huan hear Meng Chang Jun good guest, step shoe see him.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君曰；

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun say;

sentences.zh: 「先生遠辱，何以教文也？」

translations.literal: Mister far disgrace, what teach Wen?

sentences.zh: 馮驩曰：「聞君好士，以貧身歸於君。」

translations.literal: Feng Huan say: Hear jun good scholar, with poor body belong jun.
translations.idiomatic: Feng Huan say: Hear ruler good scholar, with poor body belong ruler.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君置傳舍十日，孟嘗君問傳舍長曰：「客何所為？」

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun place guest house ten days, Meng Chang Jun ask guest house long: Guest what do?

sentences.zh: 答曰：「馮先生甚貧，猶有一劍耳，又蒯緱。

translations.literal: Answer: Feng mister very poor, still have one sword, moreover sing song.

sentences.zh: 彈其劍而歌曰『長鋏歸來乎，食無魚』。」

translations.literal: Strum his sword sing: Long sword return, eat no fish.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君遷之幸舍，食有魚矣。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun move to favored house, eat have fish.

sentences.zh: 五日，又問傳舍長。

translations.literal: Five days, again ask guest house long.

sentences.zh: 答曰：「客復彈劍而歌曰『長鋏歸來乎，出無輿』。」

translations.literal: Answer: Guest again strum sword sing: Long sword return, emerge no carriage.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君遷之代舍，出入乘輿車矣。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun move to upper house, enter emerge ride carriage.

sentences.zh: 五日，孟嘗君復問傳舍長。

translations.literal: Five days, Meng Chang Jun again ask guest house long.

sentences.zh: 舍長答曰：「先生又嘗彈劍而歌曰『長鋏歸來乎，無以為家』。」

translations.literal: House long answer: Mister again once strum sword sing: Long sword return, no make family.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君不悅。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun not pleased.

Originally, Feng Huan hear Meng Chang Jun good guest, step shoe see him. Meng Chang Jun say; Mister far disgrace, what teach Wen? Feng Huan say: Hear jun good scholar, with poor body belong jun. Meng Chang Jun place guest house ten days, Meng Chang Jun ask guest house long: Guest what do? Answer: Feng mister very poor, still have one sword, moreover sing song. Strum his sword sing: Long sword return, eat no fish. Meng Chang Jun move to favored house, eat have fish. Five days, again ask guest house long. Answer: Guest again strum sword sing: Long sword return, emerge no carriage. Meng Chang Jun move to upper house, enter emerge ride carriage. Five days, Meng Chang Jun again ask guest house long. House long answer: Mister again once strum sword sing: Long sword return, no make family. Meng Chang Jun not pleased.

sentences.zh: 居朞年，馮驩無所言。

translations.literal: Dwell season year, Feng Huan no speak.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君時相齊，封萬戶於薛。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun then chancellor Qi, enfeoff ten thousand households at Xue.

sentences.zh: 其食客三千人。

translations.literal: His eat guests three thousand people.

sentences.zh: 邑入不足以奉客，使人出錢於薛。

translations.literal: City income not sufficient serve guests, make person lend money at Xue.

sentences.zh: 歲餘不入，貸錢者多不能與其息，客奉將不給。

translations.literal: Year more not income, lend money people many cannot give their interest, guest serve will not give.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君憂之，問左右：「何人可使收債於薛者？」

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun worry, ask left right: What person can make collect debt at Xue?

sentences.zh: 傳舍長曰：「代舍客馮公形容狀貌甚辯，長者，無他伎能，宜可令收債。」

translations.literal: Guest house long say: Upper house guest Feng Gong appearance manner very argue, elder, no other skill ability, suitable can make collect debt.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君乃進馮驩而請之曰：「賓客不知文不肖，幸臨文者三千餘人，邑入不足以奉賓客，故出息錢於薛。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun then advance Feng Huan request him: Guests not know Wen not worthy, fortunate arrive Wen three thousand more people, city income not sufficient serve guests, therefore lend interest money at Xue.

sentences.zh: 薛歲不入，民頗不與其息。

translations.literal: Xue year not income, people rather not give their interest.

sentences.zh: 今客食恐不給，願先生責之。」

translations.literal: Now guest eat fear not give, wish mister collect it.

sentences.zh: 馮驩曰；

translations.literal: Feng Huan say;
Yes.

sentences.zh: 辭行，至薛，召取孟嘗君錢者皆會，得息錢十萬。

translations.literal: Leave go, arrive Xue, summon take Meng Chang Jun money all meet, obtain interest money ten thousand.

sentences.zh: 乃多釀酒，買肥牛，召諸取錢者，能與息者皆來，不能與息者亦來，皆持取錢之券書合之。

translations.literal: Then much brew wine, buy fat cow, summon various take money, can give interest all come, cannot give interest also come, all hold take money contract book verify.

sentences.zh: 齊為會，日殺牛置酒。

translations.literal: Together make meeting, day kill cow set wine.

sentences.zh: 酒酣，乃持券如前合之，能與息者，與為期；

translations.literal: Wine intense, then hold contract as before verify, can give interest, give period;

sentences.zh: 貧不能與息者，取其券而燒之。

translations.literal: Poor cannot give interest, take their contract burn.

sentences.zh: 曰：「孟嘗君所以貸錢者，為民之無者以為本業也；

translations.literal: Say: Meng Chang Jun so lend money, for people none make base industry;

sentences.zh: 所以求息者，為無以奉客也。

translations.literal: So seek interest, for no serve guests.

sentences.zh: 今富給者以要期，貧窮者燔券書以捐之。

translations.literal: Now rich sufficient give period, poor burn contract book donate.

sentences.zh: 諸君彊飲食。

translations.literal: Various ruler strong eat drink.

sentences.zh: 有君如此，豈可負哉！」

translations.literal: Have jun like this, how can negative!
translations.idiomatic: Have ruler like this, how can negative!

sentences.zh: 坐者皆起，再拜。

translations.literal: Sit all rise, twice bow.

Dwell season year, Feng Huan no speak. Meng Chang Jun then chancellor Qi, enfeoff ten thousand households at Xue. His eat guests three thousand people. Meng Chang Jun then advance Feng Huan request him: Guests not know Wen not worthy, fortunate arrive Wen three thousand more people, city income not sufficient serve guests, therefore lend interest money at Xue. Xue year not income, people rather not give their interest. Now guest eat fear not give, wish mister collect it. Feng Huan say; Yes. Leave go, arrive Xue, summon take Meng Chang Jun money all meet, obtain interest money ten thousand. Then much brew wine, buy fat cow, summon various take money, can give interest all come, cannot give interest also come, all hold take money contract book verify. Together make meeting, day kill cow set wine. Wine intense, then hold contract as before verify, can give interest, give period; Poor cannot give interest, take their contract burn. Say: Meng Chang Jun so lend money, for people none make base industry; So seek interest, for no serve guests. Now rich sufficient give period, poor burn contract book donate. Various jun strong eat drink. Have jun like this, how can negative! Sit all rise, twice bow.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君聞馮驩燒券書，怒而使使召驩。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun hear Feng Huan burn contract book, angry make messenger summon Huan.

sentences.zh: 驩至，孟嘗君曰：「文食客三千人，故貸錢於薛。

translations.literal: Huan arrive, Meng Chang Jun say: Wen eat guests three thousand people, therefore lend money at Xue.

sentences.zh: 文奉邑少，而民尚多不以時與其息，客食恐不足，故請先生收責之。

translations.literal: Wen serve city few, people still many not with time give their interest, guest eat fear not sufficient, therefore please mister collect demand.

sentences.zh: 聞先生得錢，即以多具牛酒而燒券書，何？」

translations.literal: Hear mister obtain money, then with many prepare cow wine burn contract book, why?

sentences.zh: 馮驩曰：「然。

translations.literal: Feng Huan say: Correct.

sentences.zh: 不多具牛酒即不能畢會，無以知其有餘不足。

translations.literal: Not many prepare cow wine then cannot finish meeting, no know their have remain not sufficient.

sentences.zh: 有餘者，為要期。

translations.literal: Have remain, for set period.

sentences.zh: 不足者，雖守而責之十年，息愈多，急，即以逃亡自捐之。

translations.literal: Not sufficient, though guard demand ten year, interest more, urgent then escape perish self donate.

sentences.zh: 若急，終無以償，上則為君好利不愛士民，下則有離上抵負之名，非所以厲士民彰君聲也。

translations.literal: If urgent, finally no repay, up then ruler good profit not love scholar people, down then have leave up resist negative name, not so encourage scholar people bright ruler sound.

sentences.zh: 焚無用虛債之券，捐不可得之虛計，令薛民親君而彰君之善聲也，君有何疑焉！」

translations.literal: Burn no use empty debt contract, donate cannot obtain empty plan, make Xue people close jun bright jun good sound, jun have what doubt!
translations.idiomatic: Burn no use empty debt contract, donate cannot obtain empty plan, make Xue people close ruler bright ruler good sound, ruler have what doubt!

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君乃拊手而謝之。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun then clap hand thank him.

Meng Chang Jun hear Feng Huan burn contract book, angry make messenger summon Huan. Huan arrive, Meng Chang Jun say: Wen eat guests three thousand people, therefore lend money at Xue. Wen serve city few, people still many not with time give their interest, guest eat fear not sufficient, therefore please mister collect demand. Hear mister obtain money, then with many prepare cow wine burn contract book, why? Feng Huan say: Correct. Not many prepare cow wine then cannot finish meeting, no know their have remain not sufficient. Have remain, for set period. Not sufficient, though guard demand ten year, interest more, urgent then escape perish self donate. If urgent, finally no repay, up then jun good profit not love scholar people, down then have leave up resist negative name, not so encourage scholar people bright jun sound. Burn no use empty debt contract, donate cannot obtain empty plan, make Xue people close jun bright jun good sound, jun have what doubt! Meng Chang Jun then clap hand thank him.

sentences.zh: 齊王惑於秦、楚之毀，以為孟嘗君名高其主而擅齊國之權，遂廢孟嘗君。

translations.literal: Qi King confused at Qin Chu slander, consider Meng Chang Jun name high his lord monopolize Qi country power, then waste Meng Chang Jun.

sentences.zh: 諸客見孟嘗君廢，皆去。

translations.literal: Various guests see Meng Chang Jun waste, all go.

sentences.zh: 馮驩曰：「借臣車一乘，可以入秦者，必令君重於國而奉邑益廣，可乎？」

translations.literal: Feng Huan say: Borrow minister carriage one ride, can enter Qin, certainly make jun heavy at country serve city more broad, can?
translations.idiomatic: Feng Huan say: Borrow minister carriage one ride, can enter Qin, certainly make ruler heavy at country serve city more broad, can?

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君乃約車幣而遣之。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun then bind carriage currency send him.

sentences.zh: 馮驩乃西說秦王曰：「天下之游士馮軾結靷西入秦者，無不欲彊秦而弱齊；

translations.literal: Feng Huan then west advise Qin Wang: World travel scholars Feng Ju tie rein west enter Qin, no not wish strong Qin weak Qi;
translations.idiomatic: Feng Huan then west advise Qin King: World travel scholars Feng Ju tie rein west enter Qin, no not wish strong Qin weak Qi;

sentences.zh: 馮軾結靷東入齊者，無不欲彊齊而弱秦。

translations.literal: Feng Ju tie rein east enter Qi, no not wish strong Qi weak Qin.

sentences.zh: 此雄雌之國也，勢不兩立為雄，雄者得天下矣。」

translations.literal: This male female country, power not two stand male, male obtain world.

sentences.zh: 秦王跽而問之曰：「何以使秦無為雌而可？」

translations.literal: Qin Wang kneel ask: What make Qin no be female can?
translations.idiomatic: Qin King kneel ask: What make Qin no be female can?

sentences.zh: 馮驩曰：「王亦知齊之廢孟嘗君乎？」

translations.literal: Feng Huan say: Wang also know Qi waste Meng Chang Jun?
translations.idiomatic: Feng Huan say: King also know Qi waste Meng Chang Jun?

sentences.zh: 秦王曰：「聞之。」

translations.literal: Qin Wang say: Hear.
translations.idiomatic: Qin King said: Hear.

sentences.zh: 馮驩曰：「使齊重於天下者，孟嘗君也。

translations.literal: Feng Huan say: Make Qi heavy at world, Meng Chang Jun.
translations.idiomatic: Feng Huan said: Make Qi heavy at world, Meng Chang Lord.

sentences.zh: 今齊王以毀廢之，其心怨，必背齊；

translations.literal: Now Qi Wang with slander waste him, his heart resent, certainly back Qi;
translations.idiomatic: Now Qi King and slander waste him, his heart resent, certainly back Qi;

sentences.zh: 背齊入秦，則齊國之情，人事之誠，盡委之秦，齊地可得也，豈直為雄也！

translations.literal: Back Qi enter Qin, then Qi country emotion, person affairs sincere, all entrust Qin, Qi land can obtain, how only be male!
translations.idiomatic: Back Qi enter Qin, then Qi country emotion, person affairs sincere, all entrust Qin, Qi land could obtain, how only was male!

sentences.zh: 君急使使載幣陰迎孟嘗君，不可失時也。

translations.literal: Lord urgent made messenger load currency secret welcome Meng Chang Lord, did not could lose time.

sentences.zh: 如有齊覺悟，復用孟嘗君，則雌雄之所在未可知也。」

translations.literal: If had Qi wake, again use Meng Chang Lord, then male female where did not could know.

sentences.zh: 秦王大悅，乃遣車十乘黃金百鎰以迎孟嘗君。

translations.literal: Qin King great pleased, then send carriage ten ride gold hundred yi welcome Meng Chang Lord.

sentences.zh: 馮驩辭以先行，至齊，說齊王曰：「天下之游士馮軾結靷東入齊者，無不欲彊齊而弱秦者；

translations.literal: Feng Huan leave with first go, arrive Qi, advise Qi Wang: World travel scholars Feng Ju tie rein east enter Qi, no not wish strong Qi weak Qin;
translations.idiomatic: Feng Huan leave and first go, arrive Qi, advise Qi King: World travel scholars Feng Ju tie rein east enter Qi, no did not wish strong Qi weak Qin;

sentences.zh: 馮軾結靷西入秦者，無不欲彊秦而弱齊者。

translations.literal: Feng Ju tie rein west enter Qin, no did not wish strong Qin weak Qi.

sentences.zh: 夫秦齊雄雌之國，秦彊則齊弱矣，此勢不兩雄。

translations.literal: Qin Qi male female country, Qin strong then Qi weak, this power did not two male.

sentences.zh: 今臣竊聞秦遣使車十乘載黃金百鎰以迎孟嘗君。

translations.literal: Now minister secretly hear Qin send messenger carriage ten ride load gold hundred yi welcome Meng Chang Lord.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君不西則已，西入相秦則天下歸之，秦為雄而齊為雌，雌則臨淄、即墨危矣。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Lord did not west then already, west enter chancellor Qin then world waslong him, Qin was male Qi was female, female then Lin Zi Ji Mo danger.

sentences.zh: 王何不先秦使之未到，復孟嘗君，而益與之邑以謝之？

translations.literal: Wang what not before Qin messenger not arrive, restore Meng Chang Jun, moreover give him city thank?
translations.idiomatic: King what did not wasfore Qin messenger did not arrive, restore Meng Chang Lord, moreover give him city thank?

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君必喜而受之。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Lord certainly happy accept.

sentences.zh: 秦雖彊國，豈可以請人相而迎之哉！

translations.literal: Qin though strong country, how can with please person chancellor welcome him!
translations.idiomatic: Qin though strong country, how could and please person chancellor welcome him!

sentences.zh: 折秦之謀，而絕其霸彊之略。」

translations.literal: Break Qin plan, cut its hegemon strong strategy.

sentences.zh: 齊王曰：「善。」

translations.literal: Qi Wang say: Good.
translations.idiomatic: Qi King said: Good.

sentences.zh: 乃使人至境候秦使。

translations.literal: Then made person to border wait Qin messenger.

sentences.zh: 秦使車適入齊境，使還馳告之，王召孟嘗君而復其相位，而與其故邑之地，又益以千戶。

translations.literal: Qin messenger carriage just enter Qi border, made return gallop tell, wang summon Meng Chang Lord restore his chancellor position, give his former city land, moreover add thousand households.

sentences.zh: 秦之使者聞孟嘗君復相齊，還車而去矣。

translations.literal: Qin messenger hear Meng Chang Lord restore chancellor Qi, return carriage go.

Qi Wang confused at Qin Chu slander, consider Meng Chang Jun name high his lord monopolize Qi country power, then waste Meng Chang Jun. Various guests see Meng Chang Jun waste, all go. Feng Huan say: Borrow minister carriage one ride, can enter Qin, certainly make jun heavy at country serve city more broad, can? Meng Chang Jun then bind carriage currency send him. Feng Huan then west advise Qin Wang: World travel scholars Feng Ju tie rein west enter Qin, no not wish strong Qin weak Qi; Feng Ju tie rein east enter Qi, no not wish strong Qi weak Qin. This male female country, power not two stand male, male obtain world. Qin Wang kneel ask: What make Qin no be female can? Feng Huan say: Wang also know Qi waste Meng Chang Jun? Qin Wang say: Hear. Feng Huan say: Make Qi heavy at world, Meng Chang Jun. Now Qi Wang with slander waste him, his heart resent, certainly back Qi; Back Qi enter Qin, then Qi country emotion, person affairs sincere, all entrust Qin, Qi land can obtain, how only be male! Jun urgent make messenger load currency secret welcome Meng Chang Jun, not can lose time. If have Qi wake, again use Meng Chang Jun, then male female where not can know. Qin Wang great pleased, then send carriage ten ride gold hundred yi welcome Meng Chang Jun. Feng Huan leave with first go, arrive Qi, advise Qi Wang: World travel scholars Feng Ju tie rein east enter Qi, no not wish strong Qi weak Qin; Feng Ju tie rein west enter Qin, no not wish strong Qin weak Qi. Qin Qi male female country, Qin strong then Qi weak, this power not two male. Now minister secretly hear Qin send messenger carriage ten ride load gold hundred yi welcome Meng Chang Jun. Meng Chang Jun not west then already, west enter chancellor Qin then world belong him, Qin be male Qi be female, female then Lin Zi Ji Mo danger. Wang what not before Qin messenger not arrive, restore Meng Chang Jun, moreover give him city thank? Meng Chang Jun certainly happy accept. Qin though strong country, how can with please person chancellor welcome him! Break Qin plan, cut its hegemon strong strategy. Qi Wang say: Good. Then make person to border wait Qin messenger. Qin messenger carriage just enter Qi border, make return gallop tell, wang summon Meng Chang Jun restore his chancellor position, give his former city land, moreover add thousand households. Qin messenger hear Meng Chang Jun restore chancellor Qi, return carriage go.

sentences.zh: 自齊王毀廢孟嘗君，諸客皆去。

translations.literal: From Qi King slander waste Meng Chang Lord, various guests all go.

sentences.zh: 後召而復之，馮驩迎之。

translations.literal: After summon restore, Feng Huan welcome him.

sentences.zh: 未到，孟嘗君太息嘆曰：「文常好客，遇客無所敢失，食客三千有餘人，先生所知也。

translations.literal: Not arrive, Meng Chang Jun sigh: Wen often good guest, meet guest no dare lose, eat guests three thousand more people, mister know.
translations.idiomatic: Not arrive, Meng Chang Lord sigh: Wen often good guest, meet guest no dare lose, eat guests three thousand more people, mister know.

sentences.zh: 客見文一日廢，皆背文而去，莫顧文者。

translations.literal: Guests see Wen one day waste, all back Wen go, no regard Wen.

sentences.zh: 今賴先生得復其位，客亦有何面目復見文乎？

translations.literal: Now rely mister obtain restore position, guests also have what face again see Wen?
translations.idiomatic: Now rely mister obtain restore position, guests also had what face again see Wen?

sentences.zh: 如復見文者，必唾其面而大辱之。」

translations.literal: If again see Wen, certainly spit their face big disgrace.

sentences.zh: 馮驩結轡下拜。

translations.literal: Feng Huan tie rein descend bow.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君下車接之，曰：「先生為客謝乎？」

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun descend carriage meet him, say: Mister for guests thank?
translations.idiomatic: Meng Chang Lord descend carriage meet him, said: Mister for guests thank?

sentences.zh: 馮驩曰：「非為客謝也，為君之言失。

translations.literal: Feng Huan say: Not for guests thank, for jun words lose.
translations.idiomatic: Feng Huan said: Not for guests thank, for jun words lose.

sentences.zh: 夫物有必至，事有固然，君知之乎？」

translations.literal: Things have must arrive, affairs have certainly so, jun know?
translations.idiomatic: Things had must arrive, affairs had certainly so, jun know?

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君曰：「愚不知所謂也。」

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun say: Foolish not know so called.
translations.idiomatic: Meng Chang Lord said: Foolish did not know so called.

sentences.zh: 曰：「生者必有死，物之必至也；

translations.literal: Say: Live must have die, things must arrive;
translations.idiomatic: Say: Live must had die, things must arrive;

sentences.zh: 富貴多士，貧賤寡友，事之固然也。

translations.literal: Rich noble many scholars, poor lowly few friends, affairs certainly so.

sentences.zh: 君獨不見夫（朝）趣市［朝］者乎？

translations.literal: Jun alone not see rush market morning?
translations.idiomatic: Lord alone did not see rush market morning?

sentences.zh: 明旦，側肩爭門而入；

translations.literal: Bright morning, side shoulder contend door enter;

sentences.zh: 日暮之後，過市朝者掉臂而不顧。

translations.literal: Day evening after, pass market morning drop arm did not regard.

sentences.zh: 非好朝而惡暮，所期物忘其中。

translations.literal: Not good morning bad evening, expect things forget among.

sentences.zh: 今君失位，賓客皆去，不足以怨士而徒絕賓客之路。

translations.literal: Now jun lose position, guests all go, did not sufficient resent scholars cut guests road.

sentences.zh: 願君遇客如故。」

translations.literal: Wish jun meet guests as wasfore.

sentences.zh: 孟嘗君再拜曰：「敬從命矣。

translations.literal: Meng Chang Jun twice bow: Respect from command.
translations.idiomatic: Meng Chang Lord twice bow: Respect from command.

sentences.zh: 聞先生之言，敢不奉教焉。」

translations.literal: Hear mister words, dare did not serve teach.

From Qi Wang slander waste Meng Chang Jun, various guests all go. After summon restore, Feng Huan welcome him. Not arrive, Meng Chang Jun sigh: Wen often good guest, meet guest no dare lose, eat guests three thousand more people, mister know. Guests see Wen one day waste, all back Wen go, no regard Wen. Now rely mister obtain restore position, guests also have what face again see Wen? If again see Wen, certainly spit their face big disgrace. Feng Huan tie rein descend bow. Meng Chang Jun descend carriage meet him, say: Mister for guests thank? Feng Huan say: Not for guests thank, for jun words lose. Things have must arrive, affairs have certainly so, jun know? Meng Chang Jun say: Foolish not know so called. Say: Live must have die, things must arrive; Rich noble many scholars, poor lowly few friends, affairs certainly so. Jun alone not see rush market morning? Bright morning, side shoulder contend door enter; Day evening after, pass market morning drop arm not regard. Not good morning bad evening, expect things forget among. Now jun lose position, guests all go, not sufficient resent scholars cut guests road. Wish jun meet guests as before. Meng Chang Jun twice bow: Respect from command. Hear mister words, dare not serve teach.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：吾嘗過薛，其俗閭里率多暴桀子弟，與鄒、魯殊。

translations.literal: Grand Historian say: I once pass Xue, its custom alley rate many fierce strong son younger brother, with Zou Lu different.
translations.idiomatic: Grand Historian said: I once pass Xue, its custom alley rate many fierce strong son younger brother, and Zou Lu different.

sentences.zh: 問其故，曰：「孟嘗君招致天下任俠，姦人入薛中蓋六萬餘家矣。」

translations.literal: Ask its reason, say: Meng Chang Jun recruit attract world bear knight, evil person enter Xue among cover six thousand more families.
translations.idiomatic: Ask its reason, said: Meng Chang Lord recruit attract world wasar knight, evil person enter Xue among cover six thousand more families.

sentences.zh: 世之傳孟嘗君好客自喜，名不虛矣。

translations.literal: World transmit Meng Chang Lord good guest self happy, name did not empty.

Grand Historian say: I once pass Xue, its custom alley rate many fierce strong son younger brother, with Zou Lu different. Ask its reason, say: Meng Chang Jun recruit attract world bear knight, evil person enter Xue among cover six thousand more families. World transmit Meng Chang Jun good guest self happy, name not empty.
